price: Hichi ndicho kipawa chetu. Basi toa au zuia, bila ya hisabu.
arabic: هَٰذَا عَطَآؤُنَا فَٱمۡنُنۡ أَوۡ أَمۡسِكۡ بِغَيۡرِ حِسَابٖ
footnotes: Na akamfunulia kwa wahyi : Haya tuliyo kuneemesha kwayo ni kipawa kilicho toka kwetu. Yaani ni Sisi tulio kupa. Basi mpe umtakaye, na mnyime umtakaye. Hapana hisabu juu yako kwa kutoa au kunyima.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: hādhā ʿaṭāunā fa-um'nun aw amsik bighayri ḥisābin
